page.title: 10Trades
page.content: The only day he gets off is Sunday but sometimes he has to work in the morning. Sometimes Roy comes in about 8.00pm and leaves at 8.30am. Roy has to put the bread in the oven and make sure it is well cooked. About 6.00am each day Phil comes in and drives the van. Phil takes all the bread and cakes to the shops and people who have ordered them. Our bakery is 200 years old and has been in our family 62 years. That has been for 3 generations of our family. We own the one bakery in Titchfield.We have not got a garden but have got a yard. Over 400 loaves are made each day. I like living in a bakery.
